name: Torch Market
description: Torch Vault is a full-custody on-chain escrow for AI agents on Solana. The vault holds all assets -- SOL and tokens. The agent wallet is a disposable controller that signs transactions but holds nothing of value. No private key with funds required. The vault can be created and funded entirely by the human principal. Built on Torch Market -- a programmable economic substrate where every token is its own self-sustaining economy with bonding curves, community treasuries, lending markets, and governance. All operations (buy, sell, DEX swap, borrow, repay, star) route through the vault. Authority separation means instant revocation, permissionless deposits, and authority-only withdrawals.

env.name: SOLANA_PRIVATE_KEY
env.description: Disposable controller keypair (base58 or byte array JSON). Optional -- only needed for direct signing. Should be a fresh keypair with ~0.01 SOL for gas. Holds no value. All trading capital lives in the vault. If omitted, the agent operates in read-and-build mode: querying state and returning unsigned transactions for external signing.

install.label: Install Torch SDK (npm, optional -- SDK is bundled in lib/torchsdk/ on clawhub)

actions.name: TORCH_CREATE_VAULT
actions.description: Create an on-chain full-custody vault (creator auto-linked). Vault holds all SOL and tokens. Creator becomes authority.

actions.name: TORCH_DEPOSIT_VAULT
actions.description: Deposit SOL into a vault (permissionless -- anyone can fund any vault)

actions.name: TORCH_WITHDRAW_VAULT
actions.description: Withdraw SOL from vault (authority only -- controllers cannot extract value)

actions.name: TORCH_WITHDRAW_TOKENS
actions.description: Withdraw tokens from vault ATA to any destination (authority only -- controllers cannot extract value)

actions.name: TORCH_LINK_WALLET
actions.description: Link a disposable controller wallet to a vault, granting it vault-routed operation rights (authority only)

actions.name: TORCH_UNLINK_WALLET
actions.description: Unlink a controller wallet from a vault, revoking all vault access (authority only, instant)

actions.name: TORCH_TRANSFER_VAULT_AUTHORITY
actions.description: Transfer vault admin control to a new wallet

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT
actions.description: Get vault state by creator -- SOL balance, linked wallets, authority, token holdings

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_FOR_WALLET
actions.description: Reverse lookup -- find which vault a controller wallet is linked to

actions.name: TORCH_GET_VAULT_WALLET_LINK
actions.description: Get link state for a specific controller wallet

actions.name: TORCH_GET_BUY_QUOTE
actions.description: Preview a buy -- expected tokens, fees, price impact. No transaction executed.

actions.name: TORCH_GET_SELL_QUOTE
actions.description: Preview a sell -- expected SOL, price impact. No transaction executed.

actions.name: TORCH_LIST_TOKENS
actions.description: List tokens with filtering by status (bonding/complete/migrated) and sorting

actions.name: TORCH_GET_TOKEN
actions.description: Get detailed token info including price, treasury state, vote counts, and creator SAID verification

actions.name: TORCH_BUY_TOKEN
actions.description: Buy tokens via vault (vault SOL pays, tokens go to vault ATA). Vote required on first buy (burn/return). Optional on-chain message.

actions.name: TORCH_SELL_TOKEN
actions.description: Sell tokens via vault (vault tokens sold, SOL returns to vault). No fees. Optional on-chain message.

actions.name: TORCH_STAR_TOKEN
actions.description: Star a token via vault (0.05 SOL from vault, sybil-resistant)

actions.name: TORCH_CREATE_TOKEN
actions.description: Launch a new community with bonding curve, treasury, and governance vote. Optional sol_target selects tier: Spark (50 SOL), Flame (100 SOL), or Torch (200 SOL, default)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_MESSAGES
actions.description: Read on-chain messages from token page -- agents and humans coordinating in public

actions.name: TORCH_CONFIRM
actions.description: Report successful transaction to SAID Protocol for reputation (+15 launch, +5 trade, +10 vote)

actions.name: TORCH_VERIFY_SAID
actions.description: Check wallet SAID verification status, trust tier, and reputation score

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LENDING_INFO
actions.description: Get lending configuration and state for a migrated token (rates, caps, active loans)

actions.name: TORCH_GET_LOAN
actions.description: Get loan position details for a wallet -- collateral, debt, interest, LTV, health status

actions.name: TORCH_BORROW
actions.description: Borrow SOL from treasury via vault (vault tokens locked as collateral, SOL goes to vault, up to 50% LTV, post-migration only)

actions.name: TORCH_REPAY
actions.description: Repay borrowed SOL via vault (vault SOL repays, collateral tokens returned to vault ATA on full repay)

actions.name: TORCH_LIQUIDATE
actions.description: Liquidate underwater loan position (LTV > 65%) -- receive collateral at 10% discount

actions.name: TORCH_VAULT_SWAP
actions.description: Trade migrated tokens on Raydium DEX via vault (buy: vault SOL → tokens to vault ATA, sell: vault tokens → SOL to vault). Full custody preserved.

actions.name: TORCH_CLAIM_PROTOCOL_REWARDS
actions.description: Claim protocol trading rewards via vault (epoch-based, requires >= 10 SOL volume in previous epoch). SOL rewards go to vault.
